comment.body: An abstract adapter class for receiving print job events. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as a convenience for creating listener objects. Extend this class to create a {@link PrintJobEvent} listener and override the methods for the events of interest. Unlike the {@link java.awt.event.ComponentListener ComponentListener} interface, this abstract interface provides null methods so that you only need to define the methods you need, rather than all of the methods.
